title: Anthelio Healthcare Solutions Included as a Sample Vendor in Two Gartner 2015 Hype Cycle Reports in Legacy Decommissioning Vendor Category
text:
Anthelio Healthcare Solutions Included as a Sample Vendor in Two Gartner 2015 Hype Cycle Reports in Legacy Decommissioning Vendor Category [September 01, 2015] Anthelio Healthcare Solutions Included as a Sample Vendor in Two Gartner 2015 Hype Cycle Reports in Legacy Decommissioning Vendor Category Tweet 
Anthelio Healthcare Solutions, the largest independent provider of healthcare technology and services , today announced it has been included on the Legacy Decommissioning Vendors List in two recently released Gartner ( News - Alert ), Inc. reports, "Hype Cycle for Healthcare Provider Technologies, 2015" and "Hype Cycle for Privacy, 2015." Gartner is the world's leading information technology research and advisory company, and thousands of healthcare and other technology professionals utilize Gartner's Hype Cycle Reports to interpret technology hype and assess the impact and value of new and existing information technologies. These reports serve as a vital reference for healthcare CIOs and IT leadership who track information technologies and standards that are important to healthcare providers' everyday operations and ongoing evolution. 
Gartner reports state that "Successfully implementing a legacy decommissioning solution is dependent upon the approach taken; the maturity and capabilities of the vendors found within that approach; and the organization's capacity to support specific domain, operational, infrastructure, personnel and project requirements for a particular vendor solution." 
Anthelio's Legacy Decommissioning product, Legacy Archive Solution (LAS), is one of the most cost-effective, user-friendly solutions for legacy data management on the market today. LAS is designed for efficiency and ease of use, providing simplified single window access to historical discrete clinical and financial data, reports and invoices archived from retired legacy systems. It allows users easy access to view, print, export and report information in one environment without any complex programming queries. 
With Anthelio's exclusive focus on healthcare, the company understands provider needs and concerns, and realizes it is essential for them to have easy access to complex ealthcare data across disparate legacy systems. LAS is the result of years of working hand-in-hand with thousands of healthcare providers to develop a product that specifically meets this critical need. This simple, database-driven tool supports quality care by giving providers access to the information they need to make timely and accurate care decisions. 
"We are excited to have Anthelio Healthcare Solutions cited as a sample vendor in two Gartner Hype Cycle reports," said Asif Ahmad, CEO, Anthelio Healthcare Solutions. "With providers moving to new EMR systems, there is an increased need for a simple, cost-effective legacy solution. With our secure web-based LAS, healthcare organizations can archive data trapped in legacy silos, moving the information from the past to the present through aggregation of multiple databases, empowering users with quick and easy access to this critical information," he concluded. 
Gartner does not endorse any vendor, product or service depicted in its research publications, and does not advise technology users to select only those vendors with the highest ratings or other designation. Gartner research publications consist of the opinions of Gartner's research organization and should not be construed as statements of fact. Gartner disclaims all warranties, expressed or implied, with respect to this research, including any warranties of merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose . 
Gartner, Hype Cycle for Healthcare Provider Technologies and Standards, 2015, Barry Runyon, 02 July 2015Gartner, Hype Cycle for Privacy, 2015, Carsten Casper, 24 July 2015.
